content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_planks
inventory=[{"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "honeycomb_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 33}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 26, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft birch_planks, I need to move the birch_wood from slot 16 to the crafting table.
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_planks
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "honeycomb_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 33}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 26, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the birch_planks, I need to move them from the crafting table to a free slot in the inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
